title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Nearby Attractions       The City of Fredericksburg sits half-way between Richmond, Virginia and Washington D.C. The I-95 corridor has many attractions ranging from historic sites to major theme parks. Check out the links below for more information on local attractions. National Park Service sites within 60 miles:  Richmond National Battlefield Park Maggie L. Walker National Historic Site  Prince William Forest Park Manassas National Battlefield Park George Washington Birthplace Thomas Stone National Historic Site District of Columbia National Park Sites Shenandoah National Park Fredericksburg Area Information and Museums: Fredericksburg City Visitor Information Fredericksburg Area Museum and Cultural Center Orange County Visitor Information Spotsylvania County Visitor Information Stafford County Visitor Information Washington D.C. Area: Smithsonian Institution Washington D.C. Attractions Richmond Virginia: Visit Richmond
